The Badlands

The Age of Kingdoms has come to an end. 30 years ago a demonic plague ravaged the lands. You are the descendants of the survivors that fled into the badlands. These lands were previously ignored by the civilized folk due to the savage inhabitants, numerous monsters and poor soil quality.

Now the badlands are a haven from the infected hordes, Robber Barons, savage Bandit Kings and other menaces that are tearing apart the old kingdoms.

Now is the Age of Ordeals.

Welcome, New Player!

The Badlands Community

The Badlands is a 5e D&D campaign. The community exists on Discord and our games run in Roll20. The campaign is run in a West Marches style, meaning that groups change from adventure to adventure, there are multiple DMs, and a good portion of what areas get explored and what stories get told are driven by players pursuing them.

The Badlands is a co-operative setting. This means that there is no PVP in any form on our server. Characters cannot be evil, full stop. If your character concept is not someone who would want to work with others to accomplish communal goals, then you will need a different character concept.

We are a diverse community and uphold values of mutual respect. We do not tolerate discriminatory language or behaviour. We are here to have fun slaying monsters, and hope that you will join us!

Whether you are an experienced D&D player or brand new, the links below will be useful to you. In them, you will find information that helps you familiarize with the feel of our setting, some of the specifics of making a character in our world, and lastly some handy links that you will use often.

You are of course welcome to explore the full wiki, but we suggest starting with these sections.
